properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudehova divinchi asirvadinchenuga 2 Koduvemi lekunda cetipanu lannitilo nimmu 1{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Goppa aranyamulo ni nadakalanu tirugutanu prabhuverugu 2 Naluvadi vatsaramulu yehova mito nadicenu 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Purvamunnatluga cesedamimmu na nivasa sthalamuganu Paripurnamuga melulanekamu ceseda mimadhya{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mimida manuṣyulanu pasuvulanu vistarimpa cesedanu Appudu yehova nenani miru telisikonduru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kaṣta kalamulo samakurci yuntini samrddhi parikaramul Mandira panikai nivunu bahuga vistarimpa ceyumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lekkimpalenanta bangaru vendiyu ittadi inumu nakunda Kabatti nivu pani punukonumu yehova todai yunda{/lang-eng}
